sentences.en: A centrifuge would suffer unbalance and vibration after long time operation.

sentences.en: An unbalance in one sector can affect the whole.

sentences.en: But the unbalance of regional economy development existed all the way.

sentences.en: He banged against the cupboard, unbalancing a pile of books.

sentences.en: Now, arrived again to unbalance one extremely when tilting.
sentences.cn: 现在, 又到了向失衡的一极倾斜的时候.

sentences.en: Piano music shows the unbalance between itself evolving rule and the effect from people.

sentences.en: Second corporate governance structure is unbalance and insides controlling is very serious.

sentences.en: The interplay between the new politics and the modern media will unbalance the political process and inhibit its workings.

sentences.en: The investment of country and consumption concern already unbalance, must adjust.

sentences.en: There are two unbalance in my heart: careers and emotion.

sentences.en: This kind of profit - oriented fishing can only bring about the ecological unbalance.

sentences.en: Usually, field balancing is selected to eliminate or reduce the vibration caused by the unbalance.
